Comparative genomics
Project
genomics related to arthropods excluding Collembola
View
Comparative genomics of Collembola
Project
1. Assemble high-quality genomes across major collembolan lineages and annotate structures and functions. 2. Investigate the evolution of Collembola from those genomic data, and discover the evolutionary drivers. 3. Develop universal thousands of genetic markers for Collembola and further promote studies at all levels (orders, families, genera, species).

Project
1. Revise classification of superfamily, families, subfamilies, genera, especially focusing those from China, as well as Asia. 2. Revise character homology across Entomobryoidea taxa
